scripts.bundle: find dist -type f -name '*.js' -not -path '*/bundled/*' | while read file; do mkdir -p dist/bundled/$(dirname "${file#dist/}") && ncc build "$file" -o "dist/bundled/$(dirname "${file#dist/}")/$(basename "$file" .js)" && cp -r "dist/bundled/$(dirname "${file#dist/}")/$(basename "$file" .js)/index.js" "$file" && rm -rf dist/bundled; done
